name: No One Is Home
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 Entry

 Your friend is having a psychotic breakdown and the only way to help him, is to play the game that his mind has trapped him in. You’ve found symbols scribbled on paper in his room, perhaps they’re important? If you can get your friend to help you find the clues to decipher the codes you may be able to save him from being lost in his own mind. The lights are on, but no one is home.

No One is Home is a 2 player online cooperative game without networking. In order to play with a friend, all you need to do is specify whether you’re player 1 or 2 and input the same seed. When you’re ready, press play at the same time.

Game created in Godot
3D Assets created in Blender
2D Assets created in Paint.net
Music assets created in Rytmik
Linko's FPS Controller Godot Asset
cc0textures.com for Heightmap Textures
